reviews.sentence: Great location. Very close to airport restaurants shopping and easy access to I95. Staff was friendly helpful. Room was clean and comfortable. Breakfast was very good with a nice variety of choices.

Amazingly quiet location. Although I was reluctant to stay near an airport I decided to do so based on other tripadvisor reviews and was not disappointed. This property is convenient to the airport and to the interstate but is far enough from both to avoid the potential high noise levels. The property is in very nice condition and the staff is very polite and very helpful. The quiet location ensures a good nights sleep. I would highly recommend this hotel if you need to spend a night in this area.

Unexpected stay overnight. My flight to Pit was cancelled after many delays. We ended up at Springhil Suites on an airline voucher. The staff was not really expecting us due to poor communication on the part of the airlines however Eilen at the front desk was courteous and as friendly as could ever be experienced. She treated my friend and I like long time customers and we were very happy with the rooms acomodations and wonderful breakfast in the morning. Kudos to Eilen the rest of the staff and to the Springhil Suites. Highly recommend. We will definately stay there again.
Good Stay. Very clean and spacious room. Morning breakfast was good and attendant was excellent.
Great hotel. Would go again. Staff and airport shuttle were great. Very reliable.
Very nice hotel and friendly staff. The staff was very nice and friendly.

Unexpected trip yields pleasant stay. The front desk staff was quick efficient and friendly upon our check in. During our stay every time we passed by the front desk they asked about our welfare. What great customer service.

Staff is friendly responsive outstanding. The Staff was very very friendly and responsive even going above and beyond. They were excelentThe property itself seemed a little older than similar Springhil properties we have visited.
Exceptional. The hotel was very clean quiet and friendly staff. The breakfast was fresh and well balanced variety. A very pleasant experience overall.
Exceptional. I liked the location close to shops and restaurants. The staff was very helpful and friendly.

Basic comfort close to I95 and the airport. Our room was large with two queen size beds and a small LG TV set. The TV set received one HBO channel. Listing information was available only in a scrolling screen. The remote control was very basic and not very sensitive. Changing a channel often required more than one push. Sometimes the signal was lost. The toilet flush was weak or inoperative. The flush lever arm needed to be replaced. Hotel staff promptly replaced it. Breakfast was just average. Copies of the Wall Street Journal and USA Today were available at the front desk. There was also a computer and printer available. Free WiFi and parking were provided. Location free parking and free WiFi. There is I95 the airport and a large shopping area with several good restaurants. Maintenance the toilet problem should have been detected and fixed by staff before the customer checked in.

Listing information was available only in a scrolling screen. The remote control was very basic and not very sensitive. Changing a channel often required more than one push. Currently doing construction and the workers act as though they are on a jobsite not working next to a room where someone is trying to rest. They were very noisy. Employees ignored us as we would walk in. The worst Springhil I have stayed at.
Place needs renovation staff not accurate in giving time table like taxi public transportation.

Worth the money and the location was great for what we needed. Will definitely stay again. in the suite. Very roomy and comfortable for our needs. Loved the amount of That the floor had not been vacuumed very good. There were fruit loops on the floor under the desk and chair in the living area when we arrived. Maid should have done a better job.

We have stayed here for 3 years in a row. This was the first time we were disappointed. We had zero hot water pressure in the shower. We told the lady at the front desk and got no reaction at all. Not I am sorry not we will look into that nothing.

It was a nice place to work but some of the staff talk to you like a child an now I see why they can never keep housekeeping staff cause they allow staff to talk to you anyway I ’m speaking on it cause it was done to me an I was let go after an employee yell at me like I was her child then lied on me I am grown but one thing I know is this not the first time Kathy has yelled at someone but hey I ’m speaking out so you will know how they allow they staff to talk to you.

Hotel was clean room we got was king size with a pull bed from the sofa. Was missing more covers but staff quickly got some to our room. Very close to Jacksonville Airport. Very quiet and comfortable room.

Upon check in a very rude front desk agent Anita started aggressively arguing with Nicole. This happened while Nicole was trying to check me and my family in. Anita had a very very nasty attitude and acted like I was inconveniencing her. She was also cussing at the front desk Nicole was by herself checking in 10 people before Anita showed up. This whole situation is not okay and it was quite an embarrassment for your place of business. Nicole tried her best to accommodate me and my family under the circumstances. Please look into this. Thank you.

I would like to give the young lady 5 stars who worked breakfast alone with a hotel almost filled to capacity. The young lady was friendly and eager to please. I did ask her name but the staff would not release it because other guests were complaining about different issues.
The room is nice and the beds comfortable. it had be even better if the housekeepers were not shouting across the hall as our third shift team was trying to sleep around 10 am.

This location is Outstanding. The rooms are magnificent. The customer service is outstanding the atmosphere is very friendly. The location is awesome easy access to everything. We enjoyed ourselves so much that were not ready to leave. The breakfast was also awesome. Most of all I overheard a manager speaking to 1 of his employees while sitting in the dining area. I could not believe the kindness that he expressed to her. I do not know his name but he really made my day and I was like WOW. I really made me think because he really pleasantness really exemplified the quality of a GOOD manager.
